title: user login with valid credentials
description: Test the /api/auth/login endpoint to verify that a user can successfully log in with valid username and password, receiving a JWT token, user object, and expiration time.

title: user registration with new username
description: Test the /api/auth/register endpoint to ensure a new user can register with a unique username and password, and receive a user object in response.

title: user logout invalidates session
description: Test the /api/auth/logout endpoint to confirm that a logged-in user can log out successfully and the session or token is invalidated.

title: get current user information
description: Test the /api/auth/me endpoint to verify that the current authenticated user's information is returned correctly.

title: get list of available videos
description: Test the /api/videos GET endpoint to ensure it returns a list of available videos with correct video information.

title: stream video content by series and episode
description: Test the /api/videos/stream/{series}/{episode} endpoint to verify that video content streams correctly for a given series and episode.

title: upload new video file
description: Test the /api/videos/upload POST endpoint to confirm that a new video file can be uploaded successfully with the specified series.

title: prepare episode for processing
description: Test the /api/videos/prepare POST endpoint to verify that an episode can be prepared for processing, returning a task ID and status.

title: get task processing progress
description: Test the /api/tasks/{task_id}/progress GET endpoint to ensure it returns the current processing status, progress percentage, current step, and message for a given task ID.

title: get vocabulary words by difficulty level
description: Test the /api/vocabulary/level/{level} GET endpoint to verify that vocabulary words are returned correctly filtered by the specified difficulty level, including total and known word counts.
